modName: Empire Coat - A pseudo Cloth Physics test - UNP Version
summary:
A simple coat with cloth physics.
REQUIRES HDT Physics Extension.
UNP body version
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][b]Description:[/b][/size]

This mod serves as a proof of concept / test about how to emulate cloth physics using the amazing HDTPhysics Extension plugin.
The dress is based on Camilla Welton's Empire Coat design.

Craft it at any Tanning Rack.
[b]REMEMBER TO MAKE A BACK UP OF YOUR SAVEGAME, I WONT TAKE RESPONSABILITY OF ANY DAMAGE TO YOUR COMPUTER/CHARACTER[/b]
===============================================================================================
[youtube]02IqLcbdgm0[/youtube]

[youtube]6rB_n6kl8Cg[/youtube]

Thanks to adelinadragonborn for the second video =)
=============================================================================================
[b]Version:[/b] Alpha 3.48.68
[b]Changes:[/b] Increased weight a bit, added collision objects to ankle bones.

OLD VERSIONS
Version:Alpha 3.45.68
 [b]Initial Release[/b]
=============================================================================================
[size=6]Reqs: [/size]
[b]UNP Body[/b]
[b]SKSE[/b]
Latests version of [b]HDTPhysicsExtension [/b](tested on 12.29)
[b]HDTHighHeels [/b]System for the boots addon.
=============================================================================================
[size=5][b]Compatibility:[/b][/size]
[b]REMEMBER TO MAKE A BACK UP OF YOUR SAVEGAME, I WONT TAKE RESPONSABILITY OF ANY DAMAGE TO YOUR COMPUTER/CHARACTER[/b]
That being said... 
I think It should be compatible with almost everything. But Im not really sure, thats why im uploading it for testing...

If you use the XP32 hair, be sure to use the compatibility patch. It wont change anything, but will just put his collision objects at a layer different than 0 (10)
(Collision filters at layer 0 collides with everything on Havok engine, so it will also fix possible incompatibilities with other mods that adds rigid bodies at the chest/arms area)
===============================================================================================
 
[size=5][b]Troubleshooting:[/b][/size]
 
[i]"When I restart a saved game, sometimes the lower part of the coat seems to clip trough legs"[/i]
Unequip and reequip the coat so havok can realign the rigid bodies.
 
[i]"The lower part is warped and is at the other side of the body"[/i]
Unequip and reequip, or just move around a bit, the collision objects should do the rest.
 
===============================================================================================
 
[size=5][b]FAQ:[/b][/size]
 
[i]"How do I get this dress?"[/i]
Read the description...
 
[i]"Why UNP Slim?"[/i]
Because is the body I use...
 
[i]"Are you going to create versions for other bodies?"[/i]
Maybe I'll port it to Caliente's Body... but the shape of the body will be almost the same.
 
[i]"My breasts dont move even when I equip the Havok Object thing"[/i]
There are no weights on the breasts, the model was rigged using the vanilla skeleton.
 
[i]"I changed the shape of your mesh using X tool to fit my body but now the skirt has a lot of clipping"[/i]
You have to reshape the collision objects of the XML, since they are fitted to the UNP slim body.
 
[i]"This dress sucks..."[/i]
I know, the mesh was done in a couple hours aswell the textures. Feel free to improve it and unistall it or even ignoring it.
 
===============================================================================================
[b][size=5]PERMISION NOTES[/size][/b]
You are free to retexture it, convert it to other bodies and dissasemble it to understand how it works, I even encourage you to do it and if you have any questions, feel free to ask, I would be glad to answer.
===============================================================================================
 
[size=5][b]CREDITS: [/b][/size]

[b]XP32: [/b]For creating that ponytail. I wouldn't know about this plugin without his upload.
and finally...

author: Yoo
